code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var initialState={id:null};export var modalSlice=createSlice({name:'modal',initialState:initialState,reducers:{showModal:function showModal(state,action){state.id=action.payload;},hideCurrentModal:function hideCurrentModal(state){state.id=null;},hideModal:function hideModal(state,action){state.id=action.payload;}}});export var selectModal=function selectModal(state){return state.modal.id;};var _modalSlice$actions=modalSlice.actions,showModal=_modalSlice$actions.showModal,hideCurrentModal=_modalSlice$actions.hideCurrentModal,hideModal=_modalSlice$actions.hideModal;export{showModal,hideCurrentModal,hideModal};export var signupModal=function signupModal(id){return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch(showModal(id));};};export default modalSlice.reducer;
